channel.title: Sandbox on bubka hacks stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Sandbox on bubka hacks stuff

item.title: HTB-SecretPictures
item.description: A Go-based backdoor that copies itself to a system directory, establishes persistence via a registry Run key, enumerates connected drives, and attempts to connect to a hardcoded C2 domain.

item.title: HTB-oBfsC4t10n
item.description: A phishing HTML file masquerading as an invoice delivers a macro-enabled Excel workbook that drops and executes a multi-stage obfuscated HTA payload, ultimately injecting a reverse shell shellcode into rundll32.exe and establishing a C2 connection.

item.title: Metasploit: adobe_pdf_embedded_exe_nojs
item.description: A malicious PDF uses a Launch action to execute cmd.exe, which runs an inline VBScript that reads hex-encoded shellcode directly from the PDF body, writes it to disk as an executable, and launches a Metasploit reverse shell.

item.title: Metasploit: adobe-pdf-embedded-file
item.description: A malicious PDF exploits JavaScript and Launch actions to extract and execute an embedded PE payload, establishing a reverse shell connection to an attacker-controlled server.
